overview: The career of screenwriter Dalton Trumbo is halted by a witch hunt in the late 1940s when he defies the anti-communist HUAC committee and is blacklisted.
tagline: Are you now or have you ever been...
title: Trumbo

release_dates.note: Geneva International Film Festival Tous Ecrans

cast.name: Eddie Albert
cast.character: Irving Radovich in Roman Holiday (archive footage) (uncredited)

actors_characters.character: Irving Radovich in Roman Holiday (archive footage) (uncredited)
